name: VENNGRAM
description:
In VENNGRAM, you must find the right way to move, join, and intersect circles, in order to satisfy the requirements for each one of the 18 handcrafted levels available.

How to Play
  • Drag the circle over the targets of corresponding color to activate them.
  • If two circles meet, their color will mix. This can activate targets of both colors.
  • If two circles of the same color meet, they will cancel each other out.
  • The square target will only activate when not covered by any color.
  • The triangular target will only activate when covered by a single color.
